MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 and SY14 postcode areas of Whitchurch and Malpas affecting properties in Post Office Lane, Hampton Heath Industrial Estate, Chester Road and surrounding area. Our emergency response team have arrived on site and have  managed to restore power to a number of properties and we are working to restore power as quickly and safely as possible for those customers still off supply and we still expect restoration by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:28pm on 31st March 2021.
